name: Drum (itch) (Mountday)
description:
It's short platformer game. Puzzle. Jump and switch platforms to complete the game.Color boss in the end.

Controls - AWD and Q, S/SPACE, E, F for instruments. (For secret instrument use F)

Plan to make a full game based on it

UPDATE: you can see a little tutorial in the screen ->

Later will upload a fixed version (like the second version)
